metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9259 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
In Docker Notary before 0.1, the checkRoot function ingotuf/client/client.go does not check expiry of root.json files, despite acomment stating that it does. Even if a user creates a new root.json fileafter a key compromise, an attacker can produce update files referring toan old root.json file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9259` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

notary - 0.1~ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: notary package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.1~ds1-1').
